{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient in this case has a positive scotch tape test, indicating an infection with pinworms (Enterobius vermicularis). Pinworm infection is associated with a TH2 immune response. TH2 cells are involved in the immune response against helminth infections, including pinworms. Therefore, the naïve T cells (TH0) in this patient have likely developed into TH2 cells due to the pinworm infection.", "answer_choice": "B"}
